QuestData.Title: Cultists Among Us
QuestData.Description: This altar bears all the markings of the Cult of the Damned. It appears fanatics from the mainland have made it into Northrend. It might be prudent to notify the captain of the ship.$B$BPerhaps he is to be found above deck.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Captain "Lefty" Lugsail above the Stormbreaker in Valiance Keep.
QuestData.RewardText: Cultists? Below deck? I ought to have my whole crew flogged!$B$BListen... why don't we have Admiral Cantlebree take care of this... situation?
